column5: Welcome to the Lake Travis area! You are going to have a blast. We are 5-10 minutes from beaches and marina's, bars and grocery stores. 5 from Vintage Villas. Our house is a little in the woods, so you can enjoy the wildlife while being close to everything.  Inc: robes, tablet, meridian massager, bath oils & salts, welcome glass of wine, breakfast supplies, My husband is a chef from Italy and I am a painter. We are happy to cook private dinners, give cooking or painting lessons on request.
column8: Private Room in The Austin Oasis House Lake Travis
